mean_cn: n.移民，外侨；  adj.移民的；迁入的
mean_en: a person who has come to live permanently in a country that is not their own
sentence: The deer immigrants can permanently live in the zebra country since they hold green cards.
sentence_trans: 这些鹿移民者持有绿卡，所以可以永久生活在斑马国。
word_etyma: im向内，进入 + migr迁移 + ant表示人；形容词 → immigrant外来的移民；移入国内的
